Reviews.Content: walking distance central walk 10 mins via park staff friendly shuttle bus time stay bit cheaper 5 star hotel home

Reviews.Title: “New discovery in HK!”
Reviews.Author: Travel_Aviation
Reviews.Content: visit hk prefer stay central hotels expensive event exhibition week exception art fair fortunately found serviced residence botanical garden central soho lan kwai complicated walk 5min walk peak tram station 10 min connaught rd central metro tram extra 5 min station hill easy difficult especially hot humid day hk walking recommended taxi takes 5 min bus central front building hk standard course clean view fantastic cheap service option kitchen nice amenities simple cooking bishop lei international garden ymca similar bishop lei close midlevel easily walkable central ifc swimming pool twin bed overall pleasant 2 days value

Reviews.Title: “A friendly long term stay in the central of HK”
Reviews.Author: Posted by a Partner traveler
Reviews.Content: stayed 2 rd month love location easy bus stop steps theres bus coming 10 minutes wait cab staff stop cab pleasure plus shuttle bus available morning afternoon central 10 15 mins walking supermarket plaza road hotel wifi travel router reliable wifi staff smile hello quickly accommodation hongkong def miss living 2 rd hope soon thanks

Reviews.Title: “Lived here for 7 years - then I came back as a regular traveler.”

Reviews.Content: actually lived 7 renovation 75 guests term residents friendly front desk staff housekeeping maids assigned floors memo staying guests special personal touches renovation returned short term guest hotplate kitchenette changed induction hob boils water minutes free lan internet direct phone line clean ok spacious price hk spacious kitchen utensils provided nice view ones facing buildings distance didnt change bathroom ones kept 2 bedrooms suites 1 bathroom lower floor harbor facing midnight cries monkeys zoo

Reviews.Content: stayed 1br suite 10 nights loved beautiful views harbour skyline comfortable quiet clean modern kitchenette granite breakfast bar perfectly family little 3 flat screen tv dvd player helped unwind couch busy day sightseeing convenient location grocery store block easy access taxis hailed staff found staff friendly helpful loved cant wait time hong kong

Reviews.Title: “Dont like the smoking policy”
Reviews.Author: TravelllersfromOz
Reviews.Content: rd hong kong provides reasonably quiet reasonably priced reasonably spacious hk standards hotel serviced apartments relatively green environment opposite botanic gardens stayed twice couple weeks drawbacks 1 hotel smoking policy nor smoking 14th floor corridor reeked smoke smoky smell relocated night told hotel morning disturbed night staff cooperative found 2 beds firm pillows helped discomfort 3 restaurant cheap write home serve breakfast food fancy service little curt 4 serviced apartments dont provide level service hotel 5 shower bath shower curtain 6 towels provided relatively thin 7 service bit patchy apartments kitchens provide flexibilty eating bedroom apartments available hustle bustle hong kong totally experience kowloon bit hike hill taxis cheap convenient convenient park shop store road restaurants ywca building road overall found hesitant stay smoking policy
